```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(stringr)
library(digest)
```

```{r}
# part 1
dt <- "bgvyzdsv"
i <- 0
while(substr(digest(paste0(dt, i), algo = "md5", serialize = FALSE), 1, 5) != "00000")
  i <- i + 1
digest(paste0(dt, i), algo = "md5", serialize = FALSE)
i
```

```{r}
# part 2
i <- 0
while(substr(digest(paste0(dt, i), algo = "md5", serialize = FALSE), 1, 6) != "000000")
  i <- i + 1
digest(paste0(dt, i), algo = "md5", serialize = FALSE)
i
```
